info.title: Production Order (Version 2)
info.description: In addition to create, read, and update, you can also release production orders and operations. This service enables you to convert planned orders to production orders, schedule production order operations, and set further statuses for the order such as technically completed, closed, or discarded by MES. In addition, you can set the deletion flag, deletion indicator, and delivery completed indicator.

x-sap-shortText: Create, read, and update production orders using a technically improved version of the synchronous inbound service

get.summary: Reads the data of production order components without follow-up materials.

post.description: Releases a production order that you specify using the production order number.

parameters.name: ManufacturingOrder
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

post.summary: Releases an operation of a production order.
post.description: Releases an operation of a production order that you specify using the production order number and the operation number.

parameters.name: ManufacturingOrder
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

parameters.name: ManufacturingOrderOperation
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

parameters.name: ManufacturingOrderSequence
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

post.description: Technically completes a production order that you specify using the production order number.

parameters.name: ManufacturingOrder
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

post.description: Closes a production order that you specify using the production order number.

parameters.name: ManufacturingOrder
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

post.summary: Sets the deletion flag for a production order.
post.description: Sets the deletion flag for a production order that you specify using the production order number.

parameters.name: ManufacturingOrder
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

post.summary: Sets the deletion indicator for a production order.
post.description: Sets the deletion indicator for a production order that you specify using the production order number.

parameters.name: ManufacturingOrder
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

post.description: Discards a production order that you specify using the production order number.

parameters.name: ManufacturingOrder
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

post.summary: Converts a planned order into a production order.
post.description: Converts a planned order that you specify using the planned order number into a production order. You can use external numbering for the production order if required. The planned order gets deleted after the conversion.

parameters.name: ManufacturingOrder
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

parameters.name: PlannedOrder
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

parameters.name: ManufacturingOrderType
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

parameters.name: MasterProductionOrder
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

post.description: Schedules production order operations to be dispatched or deallocated using the scheduling mode and scheduling strategy. You can either choose the dates or retain the operation dates to dispatch the orders.

parameters.name: ManufacturingOrder
parameters.description:
Order  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: OrderInternalBillOfOperations
parameters.description:
Order Internal ID  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: OrderIntBillOfOperationsItem
parameters.description:
Operation Internal ID  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: OpSchedldStartDate
parameters.description:
Execution Start Date  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes and prefixed with `datetime`, e.g. `datetime'2017-12-31T00:00'`)

parameters.name: OpSchedldStartTime
parameters.description:
Execution Start Time  
(Value needs to be in duration format, enclosed in single quotes, and prefixed with `time`, e.g. `time'PT23H59M59.999S'`)

parameters.name: OpSchedldEndDate
parameters.description:
Execution End Date  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes and prefixed with `datetime`, e.g. `datetime'2017-12-31T00:00'`)

parameters.name: OpSchedldEndTime
parameters.description:
Execution End Time  
(Value needs to be in duration format, enclosed in single quotes, and prefixed with `time`, e.g. `time'PT23H59M59.999S'`)

parameters.name: OpSchedulingMode
parameters.description:
Scheduling type  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: OpSchedulingStatus
parameters.description:
Status  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: OpSchedulingStrategy
parameters.description:
Component of the Version Number  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

post.summary: Sets the delivery completed indicator for a production order.
post.description: Sets the delivery completed indicator for a production order that you specify using the production order number.

parameters.name: ManufacturingOrder
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET A_ProductionOrderComponent_2 HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--

count.description: The number of entities in the collection. Available when using the [$inlinecount](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=67) query option.

innererror.description: The structure of this object is service-specific

top.name: $top
top.description: Show only the first n items, see [Paging - Top](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=66)

skip.name: $skip
skip.description: Skip the first n items, see [Paging - Skip](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)
